post.body: - you should totally live in Bernal. We loved it there almost enough to want to stay in SF!
like Heaven
Yes, snowing in Austin! The ICE AGE IS HERE
- TSOYA on KQED! That is amazing!
currently taking up more than 1/3 of my Twitter page, and I follow 1254 people.
After a long day of gardening, we're headed to Cirque du Exotic Animals at the Long Center
Back in Austin after 3.5 hours of TSoYA and YLNT podcasts on the road
The dog has officially eaten the pecan pie! Thanksgiving is now over.
Just snuck a taste of turkey.
Shrimp salsa!!
Hungry!
Attempting to capture my dog's antisocial behavior on video so I can shame her later.
I smell onions in butter!
Eating beans in Baytown, TX
ZOMG someone is actually picking up our dilapidated semi-b0rked hot tub. Nobody tell them about the cat that died inside!
Our POD just got picked up. I think this means we officially have completed our move back to Austin.
I swear to god, I will quit Twitter if another one of my friends joins Magpie.
Drafthouse serving sangria in blood bags for vampire movies! We are seeing Let the right one in.
Getting ready to seal a bunch of boards so we can build a raised planter box so we can go TOTALLY OFF GRID FOR THE APOCALYPSE!
Writing unit tests, and having way too much fun doing it.
Conducting an impromptu Sigourney Weaver film festival thanks to Netflix Watch Instantly.
Talking to the calamari again.
Time for my weekly shower!
Last night I ate antelope. This morning, I feel like a mountain lion.
At the first day of shooting on one of my new secret projects!
Go see JCVD. So good!
Check out http://therumpus.net/ - My pal Stephen Elliot's new magazine literally STUFFED with great content and not even launched!
Hey New York! We're coming tomorrow! Let's hang out! d message me!
Just swapped our DSL for a Cable modem. So THIS is what high speed internet is supposed to be like!
Sweet fancy Moses, it's snowing!
Ben and Katie on Van Damme and Rourke: http://tinyurl.com/5pwn2o
Watching my brother do his job. So proud
God I love being a VIP
Let's all go to the Ghostland show!
45 minutes late to the bar and nobody is here yet. Phew!
Fuck yeah, Jim Bishop!!!!
Dear New York friends, where the hell are you? Don't let the rain stop the love?!!
Headed to The Bellhouse... Meet us there?
Stop 1: UNIQLO, the Japanese H&M
Underneath the Brooklyn Bridge
Wearing a lot of layers to prepare for East Coast weather...
Wow, every single one of my clients just sent me 20 emails. Everyone wants to make sure their Wednesday ends productively.
God, checking Google Analytics is just slightly less depressing than checking my investment account.
Hello, JFK Terminal 5 and your glorious free Wifi, Muji To Go, and delicious asian noodles!
I highly recommend ngmoco's new iPhone game, Dr. Awesome. Good controls, fun graphics, awesome overdramatic narrative
Finally getting ready to head back to Austin after almost a week on the East Coast. Bye, East Coast! It was fun! We'll be back in April.
Braving freezing rain while driving down Rockville Pike to have tapas with Tim, Herb, Katie, and my mom and dad.
Home from Yoga with Romych in Baltimore. Sore and stinky.
Lunch with mom, then up to Baltimore to see Romych!
Bruised my bum snowboarding at Ski Liberty. Fun and pain, what a great combo!
Backstage at 9:30 Club
Dinner in Dupont Circle, then.... Ghostland at 9:30 Club! Surprise!
First post by Jerry Stahl up on the Rumpus about the pain of being older than Obama. Good stuff, http://therumpus.net
Getting a new passport picture at HEB for our trip to Florinopolis, Brazil in February
Mixing tobacco tea, mouth wash, and dish soap in the hopes of killing the tiny little flies that seem to be nibbling at my broccoli.
Getting my hands dirty
Sitting between a shotgun cleaning kit and the latest issue of National Review.
The theme of my Xmas gifts this year is USB cable storage! Couldn't be more pleased.
Reading The Road and feeling sick and very uncheerful
Hey, I'm in Houston again!
Just discovered that @spenceke is a Mortal Kombat whiz
Surpise kosher buffet at the bar including matzoh ball soup! Woo!
At @chadlyconqueso house party, discussing the impending doom
Getting ready to go film at http://www.boggycreekfarm.com/
Just pushed another iteration of The Rumpus homepage, now with blogs by Jerry Stahl and Rick Moody. http://therumpus.net/
Wait, no I don't.
Stuffed full of homemade veggie chili.
My awesome wife just brought me a stack of cookies.
